## Security Issue

⚠️ **For serious vulnerabilities, please use GitHub's private security reporting feature instead of creating a public issue.**

### Issue Type
- [ ] Exposed credentials/secrets
- [ ] Insecure configuration
- [ ] Dependency vulnerability
- [ ] Access control issue
- [ ] Other security concern

<!-- Describe the security issue or concern -->


### Affected Components
<!-- Which files, configurations, or integrations are affected? -->


### Risk Assessment
- [ ] High - Immediate action required
- [ ] Medium - Should be addressed soon
- [ ] Low - Can be scheduled for future work

<!-- What should be done to address this issue? -->
